attributes.action: use an equivalent amount of funding for mental health care as spent on the Iraq and Afghanistan wars when our commitment in these areas is finished.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Seems to me that we can always find the Billions of pounds to fund wars around the world but neglect (I did not say ignore) the thousands of people in the UK suffering from mental health problems. If the same money were spent on research, drugs and mental health facilities maybe the quality of life for sufferers, and safety of the public, would be greatly enhanced.
